title: Retro Investment Portfolio Tracker
description: A premium investment portfolio tracker with a retro 80s aesthetic, featuring rich gradients, soft glow shadows, and smooth hover animations.

generation_hints.retro_aesthetics: Apply neon glow effects using box-shadow with multiple layers. Use CSS filters for chromatic aberration on hover. Implement scanline overlay with repeating gradients.
generation_hints.data_visualization: Use Recharts with custom neon colors. Apply glow effects to chart lines and data points. Use gradient fills with transparency for area charts.
generation_hints.real_time_updates: Implement React Query with 30s refetch for market data. Use Framer Motion for number transitions. Add pulsing animation on price changes.
generation_hints.currency_formatting: Format with $ prefix and 2 decimals. Use neon green (#39FF14) for positive values, neon red (#FF0000) for negative. Add +/- symbols.
generation_hints.animations: Use Framer Motion for card entrance animations. Implement hover scale effects. Add glow pulse animation on interactive elements.
generation_hints.responsive_design: Stack cards vertically on mobile. Use horizontal scroll for tables. Reduce glow intensity on smaller screens for performance.
generation_hints.loading_states: Create retro-styled skeleton loaders with scanning animation. Use glowing spinner with rotation. Display '80s-inspired loading messages.
